name: ToOuterSpace
description: "To Outer Space" is a 2D puzzle and educational game developed and designed by Jiapeng Zhu. Players will use the mouse to manipulate their spaceship, taking advantage of the gravitational force from planets to complete each challenging level. Through this game, we simulate the process of spacecraft detachment and sailing through the universe, enabling players to not only learn about space but also appreciate the various rich elements of the universe through different levels that are thoughtfully designed.
